name: Share of world merchandise trade by type of trade - Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
title: Share of world merchandise trade by type of trade - Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
description:
'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

sources.name: Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016)
sources.dataPublishedBy: Michel Fouquin & Jules Hugot , 2016. "Two Centuries of Bilateral Trade and Gravity Data: 1827-2014," CEPII Working Paper 2016- 14 , May 2016 , CEPII
sources.dataPublisherSource: IMF Direction of Trade Statistics data set, manuscripts
sources.additionalInfo:
'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

resources.path: Share of world merchandise trade by type of trade - Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016, Dyadic data).csv

fields.name: Value of world merchandise trade - rich to rich (Fouquin and Hugot; CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
fields.description:
The value of world merchandise trade exports from rich to rich countries. Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

fields.name: Value of world merchandise trade - rich to non-rich (Fouquin and Hugot; CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
fields.description:
The value of world merchandise trade exports from rich to non-rich countries. Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

fields.name: Value of world merchandise trade - non-rich to rich (Fouquin and Hugot; CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
fields.description:
The value of world merchandise trade exports from non-rich to rich countries. Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

fields.name: Value of world merchandise trade - non-rich to non-rich (Fouquin and Hugot; CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
fields.description:
The value of world merchandise trade exports from non-rich to non-rich countries. Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

fields.name: Share of world merchandise trade - rich to rich (Fouquin and Hugot; CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
fields.description:
The rich to rich trade series shows the proportion of merchandise exports that are exported from rich countries to other rich countries as a share of total world exports. Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

fields.name: Share of world merchandise trade - rich to non-rich (Fouquin and Hugot; CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
fields.description:
The rich to non-rich trade series shows the proportion of merchandise exports that are exported from rich countries to non-rich countries as a share of total world exports. Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

fields.name: Share of world merchandise trade - non-rich to rich (Fouquin and Hugot; CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
fields.description:
The non-rich to rich trade series shows the proportion of merchandise exports that are exported from non-rich countries to rich countries as a share of total world exports. Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.

fields.name: Share of world merchandise trade - non-rich to non-rich (Fouquin and Hugot; CEPII 2016, Dyadic data)
fields.description:
The non-rich to non-rich trade series shows the proportion of merchandise exports that are exported from non-rich countries to other non-rich countries as a share of total world exports. Calculations use Fouquin and Hugot (CEPII 2016) dyadic trade data.

'Non-rich' countries are all countries in the world except: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Cyprus, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland,Ireland, Israel, Italy, Japan, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, United States.
